# lavinmq_permission (Resource)

Manage user permissions for a vhost.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "lavinmq_vhost" "example" {
  name = "example-vhost"
}

resource "lavinmq_user" "example" {
  name     = "example-user"
  password = "example-password"
  tags     = []
}

resource "lavinmq_permission" "example" {
  user      = lavinmq_user.example.name
  vhost     = lavinmq_vhost.example.name
  configure = ".*"
  write     = ".*"
  read      = ".*"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `configure` (String) Regular expression pattern for configure permissions.
- `read` (String) Regular expression pattern for read permissions.
- `user` (String) Name of the user.
- `vhost` (String) Virtual host where the permission is applied.
- `write` (String) Regular expression pattern for write permissions.
